text: 6.17: Sng 76.7; Ais 13.6; Jol 2.11; Nah 1.6; Sef 1.14; Mal 3.2; VB 16.14Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, mani kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga suaŋv ndav shirɨ bakɨmen mben muuŋv, ne vheza mbatɨgar mben nɨɨnga tuga bakɨme hɨgi. The manin ndav shirɨ bakɨmen ŋkasŋka bakɨme daaŋgi mbur khɨngip, nzerara kegɨrga tuktɨgi?”
